config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${(f)target_path[@]}")
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${@}")
else
  echo 'Expecting valid input or configuration' >&2
  exit 1
fi

../.common/directory-children "${sort_order}" "${targets[@]}"
taskDescription: Returns contents of configured or passed-in folder
